alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 9:25AM EST until March 04 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Delaware, Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Cape May and Atlantic Coastal Cape May. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The wind will also be associated with heavy rain and the chance of embedded thunderstorms tonight. This could result in localized wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
